item.title: Halfway There
item.description: College. Times of fun, frolic, and of course, learning. For a couple days now, I’ve been thinking about the past 2 years of my life, focusing on the most meaningful aspects. I needed a place to write my reflections down, so I thought perhaps this would make for a fitting first blog post. So here’s a couple shoddily jotted down thoughts on what I think have been my most significant takeaways from school, so far.
